'''Delights of Wondrous Wanderings''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for Delights of Wondrous Wanderings is obtainable from the [[Web Event]] ''[[Teyvat's Special Delivery]]''.

Depending on the quality, Delights of Wondrous Wanderings restore '''30'''/'''32'''/'''34'''% of Max HP to the selected character, and an additional '''600'''/'''1,250'''/'''1,900''' HP to the selected character. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
